page.title: 12THE RIVER WITHAM
page.content: {Fishing}the River Witham -------------------------------------- Recently the River Witham has been canalised,to alleviate flooding. This has made access to the river banks easier.Fishing is a{recreation enjoyed by many.In order to fish one needs a fishing rod and a licence (called a rod licence).Without a licence the water baliff will impose a fine.These licences are obtained from fishing tackle shops. Every Sunday, throughout the winter months,a coach load of {fishermen}come from Sheffield to fish near the New Bridge at Bassingham. They rent the{river}bank from the land owner. --------------------------------------
